query: find me free developer hosting platforms

platforms.name: Vercel
platforms.description: Excellent for Next.js and React apps, generous free tier

platforms.name: Netlify
platforms.description: Great for static sites and JAMstack, automatic deployments

platforms.name: GitHub Pages
platforms.description: Perfect for static sites, integrated with GitHub repos

platforms.name: Railway
platforms.description: Modern platform for full-stack apps, $5 free credit monthly

platforms.name: Render
platforms.description: Free tier for web services, automatic deploys from Git

response.comparison: Vercel leads for Next.js projects, while Netlify excels at static sites. GitHub Pages is ideal for documentation and portfolios.
response.recommendation: For modern web apps, start with Vercel or Railway. For static sites, GitHub Pages offers the best simplicity.

platforms.name: Vercel
platforms.description: Optimized for frontend frameworks, serverless functions included

platforms.name: Heroku
platforms.description: Limited free tier, good for prototypes and learning

platforms.name: Fly.io
platforms.description: Global edge hosting, generous free allowances

platforms.name: Replit
platforms.description: Browser-based IDE with instant hosting

platforms.name: Glitch
platforms.description: Collaborative coding with instant hosting

response.comparison: Fly.io offers the best performance globally. Replit provides the easiest setup with zero configuration.
response.recommendation: Technical users should choose Fly.io, beginners should start with Replit or Glitch.

platforms.name: Netlify
platforms.description: Comprehensive free tier with 100GB bandwidth

platforms.name: Vercel
platforms.description: Automatic SSL, global CDN, great DX

platforms.name: Surge.sh
platforms.description: Simple CLI deployment for static sites

platforms.name: Firebase Hosting
platforms.description: Google's platform with 10GB storage free

platforms.name: Cloudflare Pages
platforms.description: Unlimited bandwidth, fast global network

response.comparison: Cloudflare Pages offers unlimited bandwidth. Firebase integrates well with other Google services. Surge.sh is the simplest.
response.recommendation: Choose Cloudflare Pages for performance, Firebase for full-stack apps, or Surge.sh for quick deployments.

platforms.name: GitHub Pages
platforms.description: Free for public repos, custom domains supported

platforms.name: GitLab Pages
platforms.description: Similar to GitHub Pages with CI/CD

platforms.name: Deta Space
platforms.description: Personal cloud computer, unique approach

platforms.name: Cyclic
platforms.description: Full-stack apps with no cold starts

platforms.name: Supabase
platforms.description: Backend-as-a-service with hosting options

response.comparison: Cyclic eliminates cold starts. Deta Space offers a unique personal cloud model. Supabase excels for database-driven apps.
response.recommendation: For APIs choose Cyclic, for full-stack apps with databases use Supabase, for experiments try Deta Space.

platforms.name: AWS Free Tier
platforms.description: 12 months free with limits, most comprehensive

platforms.name: Google Cloud Free
platforms.description: $300 credit plus always-free products

platforms.name: Azure Free
platforms.description: $200 credit for 30 days plus free services

platforms.name: Oracle Cloud Free
platforms.description: Generous always-free tier, 2 VMs included

platforms.name: DigitalOcean
platforms.description: $200 credit for 60 days on signup

response.comparison: Oracle Cloud has the most generous always-free tier. AWS offers the most services. Google Cloud is best for AI/ML projects.
response.recommendation: Start with Oracle Cloud for always-free resources, or AWS/GCP for learning enterprise platforms.
